content:
Jürgen Brandstätter asked me to share the following message:

Tomorrow --- July 9th, 9:00 - 10:00 CEST --- the European X-eHealth project conducts an open expert call on how to record the "document maturity" in European CDA documents.

Several options have been considered, but we would appreciate more input from experts. Your expertise would be highly appreciated!

Use the following link for joining the MS-Teams call: https://shorturl.at/akntT

Sorry for the short notice.
